channel.title: Plz post questions here- good coders plz answer : )
channel.description:
yeah, i made so that people can ask questions here, insteda just makin a new topic every time, i just want you to know i just started getting into making my own server this morning so i prolly wont b able to help you that much, but hopefully some of the more experienced coders could.
one question from me is: how do i make hits go up when i train my other stats? i am using the cheezscape_update source if it helps, feel free to ask any other questions here.

item.title: Plz post questions here- good coders plz answer : )
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

one question from me is: how do i make hits go up when i train my other stats? i am using the cheezscape_update source if it helps, feel free to ask any other questions here.

If you are talking about adding hp xp when you hit a dummy for attack xp then search…

 case 823:

You should see…

addSkillXP((##*playerLevel[0]), 0);

Add this under the above…

addSkillXP((##*playerLevel[3]), 3);

Change the ## to whatever you want xp to be.

Then do the same for defence and strength.

Read full topic
item.source: Plz post questions here- good coders plz answer : )
